extendedInfo.description: Traintastic Adventures await in this ultimate train set and railway adventure app for kids! This app includes railway adventures, exciting episode clips, a train set collection activity, and lots more! Fun for kids of all ages.Play exciting adventures, watch episode clips and build your very own Chuggington!FEATURESâ¢ Ride the rails with your favorite chuggers by drawing a path through Chuggington!â¢ Attach cargo cars, wagons, jet packs, boosters, and other cool gearâ¢ Celebrate successful adventures with fireworks and positive reinforcement from the chuggersâ¢ Collect and install all of the train set pieces in Build & Play mode, then explore your very own Chuggington world!â¢ Complete the exciting Braking Brewster adventure which includes tasks such as loading, discovery, rescue, and speedy deliveryâ¢ Special features such as flying, nighttime scenes, target play, and speed boosters add variety and encourage extended play!â¢ Watch video clips and interact with train set pieces in âMy Collectionââ¢ Get additional packs for 3 new exciting adventures based on other Chuggington Episodes! The Brewster Booster, JetPack Wilson and Canât Catch Koko.ACHIEVEMENTS & RECOGNITIONâ Over 1 Million Downloadsâ Editor's Favorite & Best App for Kids for Trains in Appysmarts â "A great app that kept GeekMom Sarahâs three year old occupied on a trans-Atlantic flight." â WiredABOUT BUDGEBudge Studios leads the industry by providing entertaining apps for kids through innovation and creativity. The company develops and publishes apps for smartphones and tablets played by millions of children worldwide featuring high profile properties such as Strawberry Shortcake, Chuggington, Dora the Explorer, SpongeBob SquarePants, and Minnie Mouse.Visit us: https://www.budgestudios.comLike us: http://www.facebook.com/BudgeStudiosFollow us: https://twitter.com/BudgeStudiosWatch our trailers: http://youtube.com/BudgeStudiosABOUT CHUGGINGTONThis popular preschool TV series which airs on Disney Junior, on Disney Channel, CBeebies, and other major networks worldwide, features the adventures of three trainee engines, Koko, Wilson and Brewster, as they learn to become full-fledged Chuggers in Chuggington. While kids love the action and adventure, parents have praised the series for its positive social readiness lessons such as sharing, trying your best, and why telling the truth always works out best. Visit the series website at www.Chuggington.com for more traintastic fun!

reviews.title: Extremely slow loading
reviews.comment: Kid was happy to see his favorite trains at first then it took about 5min to load on the tablet.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: David Littlebear

reviews.title: So/so
reviews.comment: Stop working after a few times, my daughter really loved this game too. Sad I had to uninstall it
reviews.author: Daria Miller

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Seemed fairly awful. Really slow and jerky on my reasonably new, high spec phone. Not many options without in-app purchases. Quite complicated for a cbeebies-age user to get to grips with.
reviews.author: steve armitage

reviews.title: Way to slow. (Booooooo!)
reviews.comment: This way is too slow its like a restaurant that have customers and they wait and saying too slow kid! Now fix this you slow!.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Downloaded this game, and it froze on main screen and would not work. Have to uninstall please fix
reviews.author: laura rippinger

reviews.title: Child\'s game ?
reviews.comment: We had 3 adults trying to figure out how to work the build and play section of the game and couldn\'t. It just sat there playing annoying music. How can a child be expected to understand?
reviews.author: Rich Graham

reviews.title: Way to slow to load
reviews.comment: Wish I had read these reviews. Bought the back ten minutes ago it is either still loading or has crashed. Needs to be a lot faster to load have a better status bar. Shame, my little boy was so excited when he saw the intro. You should not be selling this until you fix it.
reviews.author: Graham Miles

reviews.comment: Awful! Its set up to just sell in app purchases they don\'t offer an unlocked version of this game. Each new train and set of objects which you need often to keep building chuggington is 4 bucks. Don\'t buy this unless you want to buy them all its about 20 total. My son cried over wanting each train he doesn\'t understand money yet. Don\'t install!
reviews.author: Crystal Wilson

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: As for the other reviews,  it does stall at times, BUT it is still a good game. My son loves trains and this is one of very few train games.
reviews.author: Clifton Ashley

reviews.title: Hxccz r
reviews.comment: Rubcgfdb Dickies the bull the e. ah book do eat I boobs ah ah the blow up the moon me I love you what be a boob boo boo cool boo boo boo boob book Ft nk mjhmhyjuy,
reviews.author: Balamurali Bhaskaran

reviews.title: Uninstall
reviews.comment: Kid was pumped to have the game then it stopped working! He\'s only 2 and can\'t wrap his brain around why it doesn\'t work. SUCKS!
reviews.author: Danielle Dixson-Jack

reviews.title: Takes forever to load
reviews.comment: Loaded this \"game\" for my youngest son, and takes anywhere from 3-15 minutes to load. Even bought an add on pack. Still takes far too long to load. Of course the iPhone version works fine. Very poor android app.
reviews.author: Lee LeBlond

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Found this game, tried to install it, three hours later it\'s only half way done installing. I realize it\'s a big app but I have never had to wait this long for anything to install. I gave up on it and stopped the installation. It\'s too bad, my two year old son loves Chuggington and this game would have had him occupied and happy.
reviews.author: Meg White

reviews.title: Loading
reviews.comment: Game takes more than a minute to load and often crashes during the loading process.
reviews.author: Donna Johnson-Taylor

reviews.title: Runs slow on nexus 10
reviews.comment: As above. The videos are choppy on one of the highest spec tablets. The game play is awful, choppy, not intuitive. The expense for every pack is high as well. Fix it and I would pay for some of it. Waste of space and money even as free.
reviews.author: Stephen Wielgus

reviews.title: Fun game but expensive
reviews.comment: My 3yr old loves this game and its interactivity but \342\202\2547+ is on the high side to unlock all the items in this app which I must say could def. be further optimised in terms of loading and functionality. Would buy this if it were cheaper.
reviews.author: Donald Tabone

reviews.title: Chuggintion
reviews.comment: It needs to be fixed because you can\'t get out of the app unless you shut off your phone
reviews.author: Roshad Charles

reviews.title: Not worth downloading.
reviews.comment: App is too slow to load and freezes up. Very difficult to move the train.
reviews.author: Teresa Sands

reviews.title: Very slow loading
reviews.comment: Budge studio you must prove your games bur my son love it
reviews.author: Hajizakariah sam

reviews.title: Really Bad App
reviews.comment: My son LOVES all things trains. I am sad I will have to uninstall, but it just doesnt work. Very bad application.
reviews.author: Michelle Perez
